product_name: Native Eyewear Clara Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Practical but stylish, The Native Eyewear Clara polarized sunglasses give your outfit its finishing touch, while also cutting glare and protecting your eyes from the sun.
